chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall p0 p1 : prec_list, pl_compatible p0 p1 -> pl_compat p0 p1

Premises:
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
pl_compat = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => pl0 = prec_empty /\ pl1 = prec_empty \/ pl0 <> prec_empty /\ pl1 <> prec_empty : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_compatible = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => exists n : nat, pl_tl_length pl0 n /\ pl_tl_length pl1 n : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_tl_length_pl_compat : forall (p0 p1 : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length p0 n -> pl_tl_length p1 n -> pl_compat p0 p1
prec_contained_ind : forall P : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop, (forall p : prec_list, P p p) -> (forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> P p p0 -> P p (prec_cons a p0 p1)) -> (forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> P p p1 -> P p (prec_cons a p0 p1)) -> forall p p0 : prec_list, prec_contained p p0 -> P p p0
mpl_compat = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (p0 p1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some p0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some p1 -> pl_compat p0 p1 : state -> state -> Prop
Inductive prec_contained : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop := prec_id : forall p : prec_list, prec_contained p p | prec_c_int0 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1) | prec_c_int1 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
prec_c_int1 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
prec_c_int0 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
prec_contained_1 : forall (a : ad) (p0 p1 p2 : prec_list), prec_contained (prec_cons a p0 p1) p2 -> prec_contained p1 p2
prec_contained_0 : forall (a : ad) (p0 p1 p2 : prec_list), prec_contained (prec_cons a p0 p1) p2 -> prec_contained p0 p2
prec_occur_1 : forall (a : ad) (p0 p1 p2 : prec_list), prec_contained (prec_cons a p0 p1) p2 -> prec_occur p2 a
prec_list_rec : forall P : prec_list -> Set, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
prec_list_ind : forall P : prec_list -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
prec_list_rect : forall P : prec_list -> Type, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
pl_tl_length_rec_4 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 p p0 t
pl_compat_sym : forall pl0 pl1 : prec_list, pl_compat pl0 pl1 -> pl_compat pl1 pl0
pl_compatible_sym : forall pl0 pl1 : prec_list, pl_compatible pl0 pl1 -> pl_compatible pl1 pl0
pl_compatible_empt_r : forall p : prec_list, pl_compatible p prec_empty -> p = prec_empty
pl_compatible_empt_l : forall p : prec_list, pl_compatible prec_empty p -> p = prec_empty
prec_in_dta_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
prec_in_dta_diff_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
BinPosDef.Pos.ldiff = fix ldiff (p q : positive) {struct p} : N := match p with | (p0~1)%positive => match q with | (q0~1)%positive => BinPosDef.Pos.Ndouble (ldiff p0 q0) | (q0~0)%positive => BinPosDef.Pos.Nsucc_double (ldiff p0 q0) | 1%positive => N.pos p0~0 end | (p0~0)%positive => match q with | (q0~1)%positive | (q0~0)%positive => BinPosDef.Pos.Ndouble (ldiff p0 q0) | 1%positive => N.pos p end | 1%positive => match q with | (_~0)%positive => 1%N | _ => 0%N end end : positive -> positive -> N Argument scopes are [positive_scope positive_scope]
liste_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d prec_empty tnil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> P d la tl -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> P p p0 t
BinPosDef.Pos.eqb = fix eqb (p q : positive) {struct q} : bool := match p with | (p0~1)%positive => match q with | (q0~1)%positive => eqb p0 q0 | _ => false end | (p0~0)%positive => match q with | (q0~0)%positive => eqb p0 q0 | _ => false end | 1%positive => match q with | 1%positive => true | _ => false end end : positive -> positive -> bool Argument scopes are [positive_scope positive_scope]
mpl_compat_0 : forall (c : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl0) (M1 prec_list c pl1) -> pl_compat pl0 pl1
mlrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list) (l : liste_reconnait p p0 t), P1 p p0 t l
st_compatible = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some pl0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl1 -> pl_compatible pl0 pl1 : state -> state -> Prop
borne_0_0 : forall p : prec_list, prec_in_state (M0 prec_list) p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 (M0 prec_list)
pl_compatible_cons_l : forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_compatible (prec_cons a la ls) p -> exists (a0 : ad) (la0 ls0 : prec_list), p = prec_cons a0 la0 ls0
pl_compatible_cons_r : forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_compatible p (prec_cons a la ls) -> exists (a0 : ad) (la0 ls0 : prec_list), p = prec_cons a0 la0 ls0
prec_id : forall p : prec_list, prec_contained p p
prec_in_state_M0_false : forall p : prec_list, ~ prec_in_state (M0 prec_list) p
invar_1_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a c : ad) (t : term_list) (n : nat), rec_term d a (app c t) (S n) = true -> exists p : prec_list, rec_list_terms d p t n = true
semantic_equiv_0_4 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> exists p : prec_list, MapGet prec_list s a' = Some p
pl_sum : forall pl : prec_list, pl = prec_empty \/ (exists (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl = prec_cons a la ls)
mreconnaissance_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), P p a t r
mstrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term) (s0 : state_reconnait p s t), P0 p s t s0
Pos.peano_ind : forall P : positive -> Prop, P 1%positive -> (forall p : positive, P p -> P (Pos.succ p)) -> forall p : positive, P p
Pos.peano_rect : forall P : positive -> Type, P 1%positive -> (forall p : positive, P p -> P (Pos.succ p)) -> forall p : positive, P p
N_ind : forall P : N -> Prop, P 0%N -> (forall p : positive, P (N.pos p)) -> forall n : N, P n
term_list_ind : forall P : term_list -> Prop, P tnil -> (forall (t : term) (t0 : term_list), P t0 -> P (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term_list, P t
Map_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Type), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m

```  
intros p0 p1 H.
unfold pl_compatible, pl_compat, pl_compatible in H.
intros H0.
destruct H as [n H].
destruct H0 as [H1 H2].
unfold pl_compat.
left.
split.
- apply pl_compatible_empt_r in H1.
  apply pl_compatible_empt_l in H2.
  rewrite H1, H2.
  reflexivity.
- intro contra.
  destruct H1.
  subst p0.
  contradiction.
```

original: intros p0 p1 H. unfold pl_compatible, pl_compat, pl_compatible in H. intros H0. destruct H as [n H]. destruct H0 as [H1 H2]. unfold pl_compat. left. split. - apply pl_compatible_empt_r in H1. apply pl_compatible_empt_l in H2. rewrite H1, H2. reflexivity. - intro contra. destruct H1. subst p0. contradiction.
